sentences.en: "I think I'll try a hypnotist," I said with sudden resolution.
sentences.cn: “我会找催眠师试试，”我突然坚决地说。

sentences.en: 30 percent of reptiles, birds, and fish are currently threatened with extinction.
sentences.cn: 目前，30%的爬行动物、鸟类和鱼类面临灭绝的危险。

sentences.en: a tall gentleman with a beard
sentences.cn: 一位留胡子的高个子先生

sentences.en: a young, with-it film buyer.
sentences.cn: 一个买胶卷的时髦年轻人。

sentences.en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
sentences.cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

sentences.en: Drop the dough onto a baking sheet with a teaspoon.
sentences.cn: 用茶匙把生面团舀到烤盘上。

sentences.en: Fill the bowl with sugar.
sentences.cn: 把这个碗装满糖。

sentences.en: For added protection choose a lipstick with a sun screen.
sentences.cn: 选择防晒护唇膏来增强保护。

sentences.en: He is in with the wrong crowd.
sentences.cn: 他找错了同伴

sentences.en: he seems a decent lad, and clever with it.
sentences.cn: 他似乎是个体面的小伙，而且很聪明。

sentences.en: He was well acquainted with the literature of France, Germany and Holland.
sentences.cn: 他对于法国、德国和荷兰的文学了如指掌。

sentences.en: He wiped away the blood with a paper napkin.
sentences.cn: 他用纸巾将血迹擦去。

sentences.en: Her boots were covered with mud.
sentences.cn: 她的靴子上满是污泥。

sentences.en: I always wear these shoes with this dress.
sentences.cn: 这双鞋子我总是和这条裙子一起穿。

sentences.en: I saw Bob in town with his girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 我看到鲍勃与他的女朋友一起在镇上。

sentences.en: I was laid up in bed with acute rheumatism.
sentences.cn: 我染上了急性风湿，卧病在床。

sentences.en: I'm not really with it this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天早上我真的对此并不知情。

sentences.en: I'm not with you.
sentences.cn: 我没听懂你的话。

sentences.en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
sentences.cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有勇气作出改变。

sentences.en: In summer Venice is crammed with tourists.
sentences.cn: 夏季的威尼斯挤满了游客。

sentences.en: Mix the powder with boiling water.
sentences.cn: 用开水把粉调和。

sentences.en: off with his head.
sentences.cn: 砍掉他的脑袋。

sentences.en: One of the office girls was down with the flu.
sentences.cn: 一位女职员得了流感。

sentences.en: Put this bag with the others.
sentences.cn: 把这个包和其他的包放在一起。

sentences.en: Recent, more dramatic use of CGI was seen in "Walking With Dinosaurs".
sentences.cn: 在纪录片《与恐龙同行》中可以看到最新的、更加生动的电脑特效技术。

sentences.en: Season with salt, pepper and a pinch of cayenne.
sentences.cn: 调以盐、胡椒和少许辣椒粉。

sentences.en: Somehow Karin managed to cope with the demands of her career.
sentences.cn: 卡琳设法达到了其职业的要求。

sentences.en: The blame for the Charleston fiasco did not lie with him.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯顿惨败错不在他。

sentences.en: Wash your hands thoroughly with hot soapy water before handling any food.
sentences.cn: 在拿吃的之前，用热肥皂水把手好好地洗干净。

sentences.en: we're all with you on this one.
sentences.cn: 在这件事上我们支持你。

sentences.en: What will you buy with the money?
sentences.cn: 你会用这笔钱买什么？

sentences.en: with that, she flounced out of the room.
sentences.cn: 说完那话，她就猛地冲出了房间。

sentences.en: You’d better bring your passport with you.
sentences.cn: 你最好把护照带着。

phrases.phrase: away (或 off, out 等) with

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)听懂；理解某人讲的话
利用，处理；需要；忍受；与……相处
v. 伴随；与…相配；和交朋友
随即；接着就；说完那话；做完那事

trans.tran_cn: 和，用，有，拿着，随着，患（病），在…方面，因为，明白，支持
trans.tran_en: used to say that two or more people or things are together in the same place

trans.tran_cn: 和…一起， 跟， 同； 具有， 带有； 用， 以， 藉； 对…， 关于； 随着
